short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds time on the timesheet page daily, and gives you a week total.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Within the Mavenlink application, on the timesheet page, it simply adds your time for easily making sure you have your time logged for the week.
